meta.name: Cops
meta.description: COPS follows police officers, constables, and sheriff's deputies during patrols and various police activities by embedding camera crews with their units. The show's formula adheres to a classic cinéma vérité ethos. With no narration or scripted dialog, it depends entirely on the commentary of the officers and on the actions of the people with whom they come into contact.

videos.title: Flee Finder
videos.overview: StarChase is used to track a fleeing Mercedes-Benz in Alameda County. Open containers are found in a car during Spring Break. A driver takes his spray-painted jalopy to a car meet.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 1
videos.overview: In the  pilot, officers from Broward County, Fla., are observed during one weekend. Included: a crack house is busted; suspected drug dealers are arrested. A raid on a home belived to contain drugs. Suspected drug traffickers are arrested at an airport; a body is found floating in a canal; and an officer discusses his relationship with a colleague.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 2
videos.overview: In the  pilot, officers from Broward County, Fla., are observed during one weekend. Included: a crack house is busted; suspected drug dealers are arrested. A raid on a home belived to contain drugs. Suspected drug traffickers are arrested at an airport; a body is found floating in a canal; and an officer discusses his relationship with a colleague.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 3
videos.overview: Domestic problems, including a sibling brawl and a young mother who lives in a crack house with her child.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 4
videos.overview: Deputy encounters drug dealers and users on the street. Deputy Canada is participating in an undercover prostitution sting. Sergeant Deak leads, "Trojan Horse Two," an undercover drug sting.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 5
videos.overview: Sergeant Steve Canfield of the SWAT Team leads training exercises, and take down a drug addict selling a stolen vehicle. Deputy Linda Canada encounters prostitutes while patrolling. Deputy Mike Hoffman responds to calls involving an injured dog, a bomb threat, and a man with a gun.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 6
videos.overview: Captain Ron Cacciatore leads the pre-Super Bowl prostitution sweeps and drug stings. Deputy Vicki Cutcliffe cares for a toddler, after the parents are arrested in a drug sting. Deputy Mike Hoffman's shift on Super Bowl Sunday.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 7
videos.overview: Deputy Linda Canada counsels a frightened child, arrests a known prostitute, and attends a charity football game. Deputy Jim Fondo talks to a juvenile prostitute, and apprehends juvenile shoplifters. Deputy Chris Wagoner of the DUI Task Force stops a drunk driver, and responds to a hit-and-run crash involving a pedestrian.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 8
videos.overview: Deputies Jim Fondo and Glenn Topping respond to domestic calls and encounter prostitutes. Deputy Mike Hoffman conducts a motor vehicle stop, responds to a house known for narcotics and prostitution. On the following night, Deputy Mike Hoffman responds to the same house to remove the children.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 9
videos.overview: Over the course of a week, Deputy Jim Fondo tries to help mother-daughter prostitutes. Sergeant Robert Deak leads the Drug Task Force in serving a warrant on drug dealers. Deputy Chris Wagoner of the D.U.I. Task Force stops a drunk driver, and investigates fatal crashes involving drunk drivers. Deputy Baron Philipson stops a drunk driver.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 10
videos.overview: Captain Ron Cacciatore leads an undercover operation in the surveillance, buys, and arrests of drug traffickers. Sergeant Nick Frey leads his deputies in a survival training exercise. Deputy Jim Fondo responds to a report of gunshots heard.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 11
videos.overview: Deputy Mike Hoffman responds to a call of a choking infant, and a domestic violence call. Sergeant Dennis Gavalier of the Organized Crime Division leads an undercover drug operation in the surveillance of a drug traffickers in a Lincoln Town Car. Deputy Russ Budden observes a transvestite prostitute inside a man's car, and investigates a motor vehicle crash caused by a drunk driver.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 12
videos.overview: Deputy Russ Budden investigates an assault, and responds to a domestic violence call. Sergeant Dennis Gavalier of the Organized Crime Division investigates an anonymous tip of drug trafficking inside a U-Haul trailer. In Little Havana, Officer Ralph Suarez of the Miami Police Department arrests an aluminum thief, responds to a motor vehicle crash, and arrests car thieves.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 13
videos.overview: Detective Howard Rudolph goes undercover inside an RV for the Organized Crime Division's "Trojan Horse" sting, lead by Sergeant Robert Deak. Deputy Mike Hoffman responds to domestic dispute between two elderly sisters. Later, Deputy Hoffman responds to a homicide inside a residential trailer. Officer David Magnusson, Miami Police Department's "1988 Officer of the Year," engages with the community, arrests a man for possession of narcotics, and assists a missing elderly gentleman with dementia.

videos.title: Broward County, Florida 14
videos.overview: Deputy Russ Budden stops a car with a motorist for a traffic violation. Deputy Glen Topping investigates a hit-and-run crash between a pedestrian and an elderly driver. Detective Bob Faulkner of the Broward County Sheriff's Office's Organized Crime Division participates in escort service stings. Sergeant Diego Ochoa of the Miami Police Department investigates a homicide at a bar in Little Havana.

videos.title: Portland, Multnomah County, Oregon 1
videos.overview: Portland, Oregon Ofc Harry Jackson checks out a prostitute. Sgt John Bunnell meets with arrest team and they serve a search warrant, and subject agrees to call for more drugs, and seller is arrested. That seller cooperates to get his supplier.

videos.title: Portland, Multnomah County, Oregon 7
videos.overview: Multnomah County Sheriff Dpty John Blackman car chase. Sgt John Bunnell tests a drug-sniffing K-9. Dpty Lane Sawyer attempts a drug buy sting. Rex the K-9 finds more drugs. Sgt Loren Caddy attempts mouth to mouth resuscitation and CPR on a domestic violence call.

videos.title: Portland, Multnomah County, Oregon 9
videos.overview: Ofc Harry Jackson in roll call meeting, gang violence call two brothers beaten. Drug search warrant finds drugs, guns, no people. Car accident, drivers captured with K-9. Man with a gun apprehended.

videos.title: Portland, Oregon 10
videos.overview: Sgt Loren Caddy Ofc Lon Sweeny chase a guy with a sawed-off shotgun over fences. Dpty Jerry Hill talks with his CI helps Sgt John Bunnell take down a drug dealer. Dpty Mark Romanaggi serve arrest warrant.

videos.title: Portland, Multnomah County, Oregon 13
videos.overview: Multnomah County Sheriff Sgt Loren Caddy is called in to perform an intoxilyzer test. Sgt John Bunnell arrests a grandmother drug dealer. Det Doug Ross leads team to a marijuana operation. Ofc Harry Jackson talks to three known prostitutes.

videos.title: San Diego County, California 1
videos.overview: Sheriff John Duffy swears in new deputies. Helicopter fugitive search after subject hit by tazers runs away laughing. Dpty Bill Hubler rescues baby in locked car, investigates stolen VW work van. Sgt Derek Clark finds fighting woman stabbed in face.

videos.title: Minneapolis, Minnesota 3
videos.overview: Minneapolis partners Holly Keegal and Janee Harteau aid the sister of a drug and alcohol abuser; Officer Pam Melius comforts an elderly robbery victim.

videos.title: Minneapolis, Minnesota 4

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 2
videos.overview: Las Vegas Ofc Jack Clark scams a wanted criminal with a free TV. Ovc Mike Horn and K-9 Eich do routine training, then Ofc Eich sniffs out an offender. Bicycle mounted officer Sgt Debra Gauthier arrests felon.

videos.title: New Jersey 1
videos.overview: Jersey City NJ Ofc Thomas Porter investigates shootings, man accused of threatening with a bat. Domestic call about a very young child.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 8
videos.overview: Ofc Thomas Fletcher a prostitute pimped by her father who claims she is 17. Ofc Joseph Lombardo female vagrant who says the devil did it, tries to bite officer while claiming to be a vampire.

videos.title: Houston, Texas 8
videos.overview: Houston Dpty Sieck shooting call at motel is airlifted by helicopter. Man with a Gun Call. Dpty Bubba Hinton investigates reported burglars breaking into cars and apartments.

videos.title: Kansas City #4
videos.overview: In Kansas City, officers respond to a stabbing; a jealous man threatens his wife; a woman accidentally shoots her brother.

videos.title: Pittsburgh, PA #5

videos.title: Boston-Lynn Massachusetts 5

videos.title: South Florida #4
videos.overview: In Miami, Off. George Clinton assists in the capture of a suspected thief; Sgt. Steve Hammers leads a narcotics squad in a series of buy-bust operations; a shoplifting call finds the suspect in the custody of the shop owner.

videos.title: Miami, FL #5
videos.overview: In Miami, Off. Federico Chacon pursues a suspect by car and on foot; Officers Ron Shimka and Oldy Ochoa investigate an assault; drugs are seized in a bust by a narcotics unit of the Broward County Sheriff's Department.

videos.overview: Sheriff's deputies arrest a drunken-driving suspect; the police apprehend a man suspected of passing bad checks; a narcotics unit nabs two persons suspected of threatening an informant and his family.

videos.title: Denver, Colorado 3
videos.overview: Denver officers investigate a stabbing, a disturbance in a bar, and a hit-and-run, in which a suspect is arrested.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, Washington 9
videos.overview: In Washington State, Dep. Bill Cassio investigates a shooting thought to be gang related; Off. Fred Doughty talks to an assault victim; Off. Tad Davis arrests an intoxicated man who had been seen carrying a shotgun.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, Washington 10
videos.overview: In Washington state, deputy John Jiminez serves a warrant on an armed-robbery suspect; Dep. Shawn McDonald arrests a man for harassing a woman; and officer Fred Doughty responds to a woman's scream.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, Washington 11
videos.overview: Seattle officer Tad Davis is called to the scene of an attempted suicide; Tacoma deputies respond to a holdup. Also: a man barricades himself in his home.

videos.title: Phoenix, Arizona 5

Officers inspect tunnels in homeless outreach operation and try to move tunnel residents into shelters. Officers have to jack up a train car to remove a dead body. Stabbing incident on train platform.

videos.title: Little Rock, AR #3
videos.overview: Stolen vehicle stop turns into high speed chase and foot pursuit. Disturbance call with a couple drunk neighbors. Domestic disturbance and assault call.

videos.title: Los Angeles County, California 23
videos.overview: LA CA air unit Ofc Jorge Gonzalez assists officers overnight. Ofc Victor Klotz chases hit and run suspect. Ofc Rodney Peacock calms a domestic dispute.

videos.title: Los Angeles County, California 24
videos.overview: Stolen pickup truck driver attempts to flee. Officer involved shooting. Grand theft auto vehicle stopped for investigation.

videos.title: Buffalo, New York 1
videos.overview: Buffalo, NY backing up detective in burglary. Swat Team raid on alleged drug dealer. Investigate a dead body in a yard. Snake call in a yard.

videos.title: Tampa, Florida 7
videos.overview: In Tampa, Fla., undercover officers attempt to catch suspected drug buyers; an incident involving allegedly stolen snakes.

videos.title: Buffalo, New York 6
videos.overview: Ofc Al Monteforte assault call. Ofc Darryl Williams disturbance call woman chased with a knife.

videos.title: Best Chases Special Edition
videos.overview: KC, MO Ofc John Wagner car chase 35 mph with on rim right front wheel. Cleveland, OH Ofc Gary Mullins/Gonzales after a GTA. Fort Worth, TX Cpl Jim Burnett suspicious vehicle, chopper follows chase.

videos.overview: Portland, OR Narcotics Task Force warrant execution and recover truckload of stolen valuables. Las Vegas, NV Narcotics Unit drug arrest, arrest and reverse drug buyer sting. Denver, CO drug sting.

videos.overview: Providence, R.I., officers stake out an area frequented by drug dealers. Also: Boston officers arrest a car-theft suspect; assist two women who claim a teenager stole their lawn furniture; and investigate an alleged auto theft.

videos.title: Miami-Homestead, Florida 16

A Southern Florida SWAT team suits up for a large scale drug raid, a myriad of evidence is recovered at the scene. videos.title: Providence, RI 1
videos.overview: A vehicular pursuit with a carjacking suspect turns into a foot chase and eventual arrest. Officers assist a struggling single mother with her unruly son. A freshly sprung ex-inmate is apprehended.

videos.title: Providence, Rhode Island 2
videos.overview: Officers pursue a driver who ran a stop sign; respond to a call about a rabid dog; and settle a dispute. Also: the investigation of an alleged domestic disturbance involving a man, his wife and his mother.

videos.title: Miami-Homestead, Florida 19
videos.overview: Alleged drug pushers are targeted in a sting; juveniles are stopped in a suspected stolen auto; a man is arrested for allegedly making threats against his ex-lover. Also: a report of a possible suicide is investigated.

videos.title: Miami-Homestead, Florida 20
videos.overview: Officers join the rescue operation after an airliner crash and investigate an auto accident involving an alleged drunken driver. Also: drug paraphernalia is found on a bicyclist.

videos.title: Providence, RI/Boston, MA 2
videos.overview: Police intervene when a man threatens suicide. A stabbing suspect is arrested. A dispute between neighbors is settled. A paranoid woman makes a burglary call.

videos.title: Boston-Lynn Massachusetts 8
videos.overview: Boston officers arrest an alleged shoplifter; search for a missing 5-year-old; and look for the driver of an overturned truck. Also: a woman's claim that her father assaulted her is investigated; a dispute involving ownership of a bicycle is resolved.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA #12
videos.overview: In the Seattle area, deputies assist a man who claims he was assaulted; arrest a man allegedly in possession of a stolen car; and pursue a suspect wanted on outstanding warrants.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA 13
videos.overview: In the Seattle-Tacoma area, a woman claims she was assaulted by her ex-husband; a deputy covers a road with flares to stop a fleeing suspect; three neighboring families have a dispute over an abandoned boat.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA 14
videos.overview: In Seattle-Tacoma, a woman believed to be suicidal is impaled with a knife during an alleged struggle with officers; a robbery suspect hides in a wooded area; three children are attended to after their parents are arrested.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA 15
videos.overview: In Seattle-Tacoma, a deputy helps two citizens trying to detain an alleged hit-and-run driver; pepper spray is used on a domestic-dispute suspect; a woman reportedly strikes a man with an ax handle at a trailer park.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA 16
videos.overview: In Seattle-Tacoma, a K-9 unit helps catch a suspect who fled from a drug bust; phony police ID is found on a man alleged to have assaulted a woman at a motel; two Native American siblings request to be taken to a tribal jail.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA 17
videos.overview: A chase results when a vehicle refuses to pull over; a man is arrested for reportedly shoplifting lottery tickets from a convenience store; a woman claims her husband has violated a restraining order.

videos.title: Pierce County, WA #20
videos.overview: A Pierce County Deputy investigates a report of two suspicious men firing a shotgun in a field, at the scene it is learned that the men are farmhands who were hired to slaughter cows. A domestic violence call at a Pierce County residence is investigated, at the scene the suspect and victim are found in an upstairs bedroom together. A King County shop owner calls to report an alleged robbery that had occurred while he was cleaning up a spill.

videos.title: Pierce County, WA 18
videos.overview: Woman eats and leaves without paying arrested on felony warrant. Report of rifle shots. Van stopped for report of man brandishing hand gun.

videos.title: Pierce County, WA 19
videos.overview: Seattle-Tacoma officers respond to a report of a man with a gun; pursue two suspects in a drug transaction; and question three suspects who claim their marijuana is for medicinal purposes.

videos.title: Fresno, California 1
videos.overview: Deputies in Fresno County utilize the help of the K-9 Unit to fish out an elusive suspect who had taken refuge in a plant nursery. A Fresno Deputy is flagged down by a group of people, they inform him that a near fatal altercation arose after a man's dog was accidentally hit. The suspect and gun that was brandished are located nearby. A call concerning a vehicle fire on the side of a remote Fresno County highway is investigated.

videos.title: Fresno, CA 2
videos.overview: Authorities work to detain an intoxicated and naked male suspect. Agents are airlifted to a remote marijuana grow operation. A car is searched as a result of a traffic stop and drugs are recovered.

videos.title: Fresno, CA 3
videos.overview: A man forgets about the joint behind his ear on a traffic stop. An interpreter is called in to assist with the arrest during a domestic call. A driver is sent on his way after a flagrant traffic stop.

videos.title: Fort Myers, Florida 1
videos.overview: A male fugitive is found sleeping on a bus and gets a rude awakening. A domestic dispute involving a very pregnant woman is investigated. Two male suspects are misled in a transactional arrangement.

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA 20
videos.overview: Shots fired call finds man on roof. 911 call domestic violence. Adult son threatens mother and her boyfriend.

videos.title: Fort Myers, FL 2
videos.overview: EMT's save an infant with respiratory issues. Shoplifting suspects are arrested with the help of security footage. A buffet manager has a dispute with patrons over the definition of "all you can eat."

videos.title: Seattle; Tacoma, WA 21
videos.overview: A distressed Pierce County mother and her husband work with a Deputy to find their runaway 14-year-old daughter, who is attempting to run away with an older male friend. A Pierce County mother abandons her young son in a car on the side of the road after her son bit her during an argument. A 9-year-old King County boy alerts authorities about his mother's boyfriend assaulting her, at the scene we learn that the suspect was in violation of a no contact order and he's arrested.

videos.title: Fort Myers, FL 3
videos.overview: A report of an elderly ex-con firing off rounds in his home ends in arrest. Two youths are rescued from atop a water tower. A sexual solicitation incident turns into an attempted armed robbery.

videos.title: Fort Myers, Florida 4
videos.overview: Authorities inadvertently stumble upon a marijuana grow operation. An officer investigates an alcohol induced domestic call. A suspect claiming to be asking for directions is quickly busted for drugs.

videos.title: Fort Myers, FL #5
videos.overview: A Fort Myers mental hospital escapee is located by authorites, but is combative and threatens self-harm when confronted by officers. A Lee County resident alerts authorities about a suspected bald eagle that's trapped in her chimney. A report of a DUI accident is investigated, the demonstrably drunk driver of the overturned truck flees the scene but is ultimately arrested.

videos.title: Fort Myers, FL 6
videos.overview: A traffic stop is conducted to examine a vehicle's tags, the driver is placed in the back of the cruiser and shares a tearful goodbye with his daughter before being taken into custody. Back-up is called in a traffic stop involving two unruly men, one of which alleges that he needs medical attention and is carted off by EMTs. A domestic dispute at a Lee County trailer park is investigated, at the scene the female victim is observably badly beaten and the assailant is arrested on the spot.

videos.title: Fresno, California 4
videos.overview: An unruly driver is arrested after several warnings. Officers engage in a pursuit with a driver harboring an array of damning evidence.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 16
videos.overview: In Las Vegas, a look at a casino's security system shows how customers attempt to cheat. Also: officers respond to a reported shooting involving children; and a domestic dispute.

videos.title: Las Vegas, NV #17
videos.overview: In Las Vegas, an accidental family shooting is suspected of having been intentional; an alleged bicycle thief is caught in a sting; a driver is found to have a pistol, marijuana and an underage companion.

videos.title: Las Vegas, NV 18
videos.overview: In Las Vegas, the police respond to calls reporting the beating of a woman with a bat, and a burglary in progress in which the suspect is revealed to be a family friend. Also: a night in a Las Vegas jail.

videos.title: Las Vegas, NV #19
videos.overview: After being stopped following a vehicle chase, a suspected thief flees on foot. Also: officers respond to a reported battery at a convenience store, and to a man on a roof believed to be on drugs.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 20
videos.overview: En route to a call involving burglary suspects, Las Vegas officers spot an alleged drug user. Also: a man is arrested for stealing bicycles from the police's impound facility; a suspect is caught with stolen credit cards.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 21
videos.overview: A delirious woman becomes defensive when she's accused of bizarre behavior and begins fighting with officers in front of her kids. Grandma arrives and explains just how dire the situation has become. North Las Vegas officers assist a mother with her wayward daughter. The emotional teen argues that she can take care of herself on the streets. The officers offer her a choice: a ride to jail or home with her mom. A paranoid man clad in only a towel makes wild claims of being chased by unseen men.

videos.title: Las Vegas, NV 22
videos.overview: Police pursue van-theft suspects; search the home of a man arrested for drug possession; question an alleged transvestite and two suspicious males.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 23
videos.overview: In Las Vegas, officers snare alleged johns in a prostitution sting; a traffic-accident victim is assisted; a suspect is arrested for operating a car with a stolen license plate.

videos.title: Kansas City, Missouri; Kansas City, Kansas 17
videos.overview: An officer chases a suspect who tries to escape after a traffic stop; officers encounter a pot-bellied pig while attempting to serve a warrant; a deputy checks the identity of a driver using someone else's car.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 24
videos.overview: A man claims self-defense after reportedly stabbing another man during a robbery attempt; an apparent suicide is investigated; an officer sorts out a dispute between neighbors.

videos.title: Kansas City, Missouri; Kansas City, Kansas #18
videos.overview: Officers respond to a shooting; sort out a landlord-tenant dispute stemming from alleged drug use; encounter a naked man sitting in the street.

videos.title: Las Vegas, NV 25
videos.overview: A woman calls 911 screaming for help. Eagle-eyed officers spot her abusive boyfriend fleeing the scene. The battered woman admits she finds it hard to leave the situation despite the beatings. A bashful man hides behind a topless club with a woman he just picked up. The honest hooker admits she enjoys her work and was paid twenty dollars for her services tonight. A trespassing call becomes a theft investigation when officers find several expensive items in the purse of a wig-wearing man.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 26
videos.overview: A burglary suspect is arrested after entering a detective's backyard; officers respond to a report of drug use in a park; a sting operation targets alleged johns.

videos.title: Kansas City 19
videos.overview: A suspicious van is found to contain an alleged prostitute and customer; officers sort out a domestic dispute allegedly involving a man demanding to see his ex-girlfriend; a suspected unlicensed driver refuses to pull over.

videos.title: Kansas City, Missouri; Kansas City, Kansas 20
videos.overview: Kansas City officers pursue an armed-robbery suspect and sort out a domestic dispute. Also: the pursuit of a suspect believed to be linked to a recent homicide.

videos.title: Las Vegas, Nevada 27
videos.overview: A man drinking a beer on the sidewalk in North Las Vegas decides to resist arrest. The suspect proclaims his innocence even after officers locate multiple baggies of cocaine in his pockets. When officers respond to a shots fired call, they find a bloody man on the ground who claims he was beaten and thrown from a car. Officers recover equipment stolen from a convention in Las Vegas worth $60,000. When a man runs from a car stop, officers set up a perimeter and find him hiding in a bush.

videos.title: Kansas City 21
videos.overview: Officers investigate a woman's claim of a sexual assault on her daughter; and a report of vandalism by a woman's boyfriend. Also: a domestic dispute between two cousins.

videos.title: Houston, Texas #9
videos.overview: A deputy assists when a traffic stop turns into a large drug bust, and later, the same officer is nearly hit by an alleged drunken driver; two suspects are caught when a train cuts off their escape route.

videos.title: Sturgis Biker Rally 1997 Special Edition
videos.overview: Footage of a motorcycle rally in South Dakota and coverage of police activities at the event.

videos.overview: Officers question a man who claims his father abused him and respond to a domestic dispute. Also: the pursuit of a suspected drug addict who allegedly inhaled paint fumes.

videos.overview: Officers pursue a suspect allegedly driving at high speeds; and respond to a domestic dispute involving a man, his girlfriend and her mother, who claims he's abusive. Also: a man with a hot-water heater is questioned.

videos.overview: Officers respond to a shooting said to be in self-defense; an assault suspect is arrested; a young boy is accused of stealing a cigarette lighter.

videos.title: Las Vegas, NV 29
videos.overview: Separate suspect searches reveal drug paraphernalia and a weapon; a domestic dispute involves a woman and her daughter.

videos.title: Houston, Texas 11
videos.overview: From Houston, Texas. A shooting incident, a stabbing victim won't identify his attacker and deputies deal with a suicidal suspect.

videos.title: Nashville, Tennessee 10
videos.overview: Officers pursue an allegedly stolen moped; and question a skirt-wearing man believed to be exposing himself to passing motorists. Also: three men seen leaving a suspected crack house are interviewed.

videos.title: Houston, Texas 12
videos.overview: Officers find marijuana after chasing a suspect; question two men in an area known for drug activity; stop a suspect who allegedly aimed a realistic-looking toy gun at someone.

videos.title: Houston, Texas 13
videos.overview: A suspect flees after a traffic stop; a man accuses his wife of threatening him with a knife; a woman claims her boyfriend beat her while she was holding her young child.

videos.title: Kansas City 24
videos.overview: Officers subdue a suspect alleged to have threatened his family; respond to a traffic accident in which a fellow officer was injured; sort out a domestic dispute involving an alleged crack addict.

videos.title: Houston, Texas 14
videos.overview: Officers respond to a report of a pit bull killing another dog; and probe a domestic dispute allegedly caused by a wife's penchant for playing bingo. Also: a fleeing suspect is pursued.

videos.overview: Officers capture assault suspects; arrest an alleged carjacker; and question a trespassing suspect. Also: a domestic dispute involving a man and his teenage son.

videos.title: Nashville, Tennessee 11
videos.overview: Officers respond to an alleged hit-and-run; question two men involved in a traffic dispute; pull over a vehicle reported stolen; and mediate an argument between neighbors over a cat.

videos.title: Nashville, Tennessee 12

videos.overview: A deputy comes upon a robbery in progress; a woman mistakenly gives an officer a marijuana cigarette along with her ID; a lieutenant sorts out a dispute between twin sisters.

videos.overview: Police pursue a driver who ran a stop sign. A suspect wearing a D.A.R.E. T-shirt is found to be in possession of drugs. A woman claims the drugs found in the vehicle she's sleeping in are not hers.

videos.title: Coco the Clown
videos.overview: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected "johns."

videos.title: Mardi Gras 2002 1

videos.title: Mardi Gras 2002 2
videos.overview: A suspect is arrested after officers find a loaded gun during a routine search. Two men are detained suspected of battery. During Mardi Gras officers arrest a man pickpocketing.

videos.title: Grand Theft Auto 1 Special Edition
videos.overview: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control of the vehicle and runs into a stop sign. With the aid of stop sticks, a driver's car becomes disabled. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a drug house.

videos.title: Kids in Peril Special Edition
videos.overview: When one of the officers attempts to grab a suspect, the suspect unexpectedly assaults the officer in an attempt to avoid arrest. An officer responds to a stabbing. An officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing child.

videos.overview: The victim of the home invasion robbery tells a dispatch operator that a man held him at gun-point. A man in a wheelchair is in a stand-off with campus police. Officers respond to a call about a knife-wielding assailant.

videos.overview: A driver takes several units on a reckless journey on the wrong side of the highway. Officers sets up a reverse sting operation designed to capture a suspected drug dealer. Officers decide to pull over a driver who intentionally avoided a road block.

videos.overview: Officers conduct a routine traffic stop on a vehicle that ran a stop sign. Officers and residents systematically retrieve birds from a fireplace and release them outside. A police department conducts a reverse drug-sting.

videos.overview: Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with no headlights. A suspect is caught in the act of burying a bag filled with illegal prescription drugs. Buy-Bust drug operation.

videos.title: Bad Girls! 1 Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers coordinate a prostitution sting. Officers pull over a vehicle with a missing license plate. Officers stop a woman driving a stolen vehicle.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 28

videos.overview: A Special Operations Unit coordinates a city-wide "buy bust" sting designed to apprehend street level drug dealers. Officers join units in pursuit of a stolen SUV. An officer arrests two brothers for public intoxication.

videos.overview: An officer poses as a prostitute in an attempt to attract interested "johns". A suspect flees on foot through the woods following an assault. An officer decides to check out a local bar where a lot of illegal activity takes place.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 31
videos.overview: Detectives stop a vehicle leaving a known drug house and find a loaded concealed gun while searching one of the passengers. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 32
videos.overview: A female victim tells the officers that two men kicked in her front door. Three suspects attempt to steal a bicycle in an alley. Following routine questioning of a petrified wife, officer arrests the husband for domestic abuse.

videos.title: Bad Girls! 2 Special Edition
videos.overview: The occupants of a car try to conceal their identities. Officers investigate a vehicle lingering near a park known for illicit sexual activity. Officer investigates a robbery claim at a truck stop.

videos.title: Domestic Disturbance Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers encounter an unusual situation where the victim and suspect have barricaded themselves inside the house. Officers respond to a domestic dispute at a nearby apartment complex. A man explains how his ex-girlfriend climbed into his window.

videos.title: Stun Gun Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers investigate two vehicles involved in an accident. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a knife. Officers respond to a call involving a man with a gun at a nearby convenience store.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 33
videos.overview: A bewildered driver claims that he did not see the lights or hear the sirens when he was signaled to stop. Officers investigate a call regarding a suspicious parked car. A manager of an apartment complex is assaulted by their intoxicated tenants.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 34
videos.overview: A sibling reluctantly called authorities when his belligerent brother refused to leave his mother's home. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle parked at a local gas station.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 35
videos.overview: An officer coordinates a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspects who solicit prostitutes. An inebriated man is detained until he sobers up. Officers stop a vehicle which was reported stolen.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 36
videos.overview: A young girl may be the victim of a sexual assault. An officer spots a speeding motorcycle and attempts a routine stop. Officers serve a violation of domestic violence warrant on an inebriated guest at a local hotel.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 37
videos.overview: A vehicle tries to force an off-duty deputy off of the road. An officer responds to a domestic disturbance call involving a woman and her husband's potential lover. A hostile man is out-of-control at a local residence.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 38
videos.overview: Following a brief pursuit, the desperate driver bails out of the vehicle and flees on foot. An officer responds to an assault call. When a dog owner returns home, she's informed of her dog's mayhem and given a verbal warning and citation.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 39
videos.overview: Officers pursue a vehicle traveling up to 100mph on a local freeway. An officer is dispatched to a larceny in progress at a local convenience store. A man threatens an elderly woman at theirresidence.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 40
videos.overview: Officers set up a sting designed to capture unsuspecting bicycle thieves. An Officer conducts a routine traffic stop on a vehicle with fraudulent tags. An officer pulls over a vehicle after observing a suspected prostitute enter the vehicle.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 41
videos.overview: A chase ends when one of the police units successfully performs a pit maneuver which eventually disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

videos.title: Guns Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers assist on a call regarding a fight at a local residence. On a felony stop a juvenile male with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

videos.title: Drug Enforcement Special Edition
videos.overview: A reverse drug operation, designed to nab suspects who attempt to purchase narcotics from undercover officers, proves successful for officers in both Tampa, FL and Palm Beach County, FL. Officers are in search of a burglary suspect.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 42
videos.overview: A desperate driver attempts to flee on foot. Officers investigate a complaint in front of a local convenience store. Officers coordinate a sting designed to apprehend suspects who patronize prostitutes.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 43
videos.overview: Officers are involved in a high-speed pursuit of suspected larcenists. Officers order occupants out of a vehicle and immediately give the driver a sobriety test. Officers report to a call of a dispute in a neighborhood.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 44
videos.overview: Three male suspects are apprehended for solicitation. Officers respond to a domestic violence call at a nearby apartment complex. An officer is alarmed when she discovers an older male is the boyfriend of a teenager.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 45
videos.overview: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress call at a local tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 46
videos.overview: A vehicle is caught traveling in the opposite direction. A sting operation is designed to nab suspects who attempt to purchase narcotics. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local thrift store.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 47
videos.overview: Officers are left to solve the crime after signs of an apparent stabbing. A man loiters in a private park. A driver insists that the car is his - even though he needs a screwdriver to start the ignition and the plates are stolen.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 48
videos.overview: Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with no headlights. A suspect is caught in the act of burying a bag filled with illegal prescription drugs. Buy-Bust drug operation.

videos.title: New Orleans, Louisiana: Mardi Gras 2003
videos.overview: Officers arresting a man for mooning a crowd. Three men fight when one of their female friends is groped. A man is arrested climbing down a drainpipe. Officers close the celebration clearing the streets with horse-mounted officers, and a fight is ended by the officers.

videos.title: Bad Girls! 3 Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers charged two women with public intoxication and disturbing the peace after their alleged fight. Girls in street with just body paint on her top. Guy arrested for consensual licking a girl's breast. Girl from Arkansas is warned for allowing gropes for beads. A female suspect is arrested for vandalism after pouring beer on a cameraman's equipment. Guy arrested for unzipping his jeans and exposing body part. Three men fight when one of them gropes a female victim. Girl slugs another girl with fist in front of officers.

videos.title: Rescues 1 Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers assist in rescuing a man from a rushing river. A suspect taunts officers during a slow speed chase. Officers assist a rescue team with the extraction of a man from his vehicle after a car wreck. An officer spots an apartment fire.

videos.title: Rescues 2 Special Edition
videos.overview: A vehicle is stopped in a known drug area; a suspect suffering from delirium holds his wife as a hostage; a man is rescued out a flooded waterway only to return to try to save his truck.

videos.title: Naked Cops 2
videos.overview: A man wearing women's underwear exposes himself. While on patrol officers question a naked man in the backseat of a vehicle who explains to officers that he's camping. It takes several officers to take down a deranged naked man.

videos.title: Resisting Arrest 1
videos.overview: An intoxicated woman fights with OH Ofc Chris Manson after an accident. K-9 helps Sgt Hartman with drug arrest. Deputy Meaux and three officers subdue trailer park wife-beater.

videos.title: Jersey Cop Special Edition
videos.overview: Passaic County New Jersey Sheriff's Deputy Cpl. Anthony Damiano detains a suspicious male he saw sidestep into a nearby apartment building and discovers he was smoking pot in a hallway; a man is questioned and admits to possessing crack cocaine but tries to convince a sheriff's deputy to let him go.

videos.title: Bad Girls! 4 Special Edition
videos.overview: Cop stops guy with wrong drive-through order. Officer assists another fighting with couple that stole car keys from a valet, the girl bites officer. Uncooperative woman in traffic stop. Girl stopped has drugs she gives from bra, becomes violent.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 49
videos.overview: A disastrous carjacking results in an arrest. Officers make an arrest in a domestic abuse call involving two women Officers find drug paraphernalia on a man who's suspiciously parked in the middle of the street.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 50
videos.overview: Officers question a couple looking to score drugs. Officers respond to a domestic violence call. Officers assist on a shots fired call in which the suspect asserts that the weapon went off "accidentally".

videos.title: Ho! Ho! Ho! 1 Special Edition
videos.overview: Prostitute sting operations prove successful for undercover officers in both Wichita, KS and Palm Beach, FL. Officers inform an unsuspecting John that the individual offering up services is likely not who he thinks they are.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 51
videos.overview: Residents beat and detain a prowling suspect who was caught peeping in neighbor's windows; officers stop a suspicious acting Lincoln Towncar and during a search, find drugs and thousands of dollars; and after a burglary drugs are found in a bicyclist's backpack.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 52
videos.overview: Officers engage in a high-speed chase with a motorcycle going 100 mph. A Florida man becomes verbally abusive with a woman and her mother. Police arrest a man who is pulled over for expired tags and end up seizing a rifle and 20 rounds of ammo.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 53
videos.overview: Police use video to make an arrest for burglary, battery and resisting arrest. Police respond to a disturbance call and officers attempt to help the two neighbors reconcile their differences. Officers arrest a woman for domestic violence.

videos.title: Foolish Criminals 2
videos.overview: A man is arrested for stealing a large amount of copper wire from a business owner. A young man on a bicycle is charged with possession of drug paraphernalia and public intoxication. A man whose tags expired by a few years is pulled over.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 54
videos.overview: A dangerous high-speed pursuit quickly comes to a head after the driver loses control. In Florida a man is pulled over in a stolen vehicle and asserts the car belongs to his parents. Arrests are made in a Florida prostitute sting.

videos.title: War on Drugs 1
videos.overview: A suspect attempts to discard drugs during a foot chase. A man fails to pull over for minor infraction and then bails out his car on foot. A man is arrested after being spotted in a drug transaction.

videos.title: War on Drugs 2
videos.overview: Undercover officers set up a sting operation to nab people looking to buy drugs. A woman tries to conceal drugs in her mouth. Then a repeat offender who has a history of threatening officers with a tainted needle is arrested.

videos.title: Love Hurts Part 1
videos.overview: Albuquerque, NM Ofc John Bode stops woman from choking man with a sock. Ft Worth Ofc William Paine talks to a woman with two black eyes that won't press charges in domestic dispute. Jacksonville, FL Sheriff's Dep Joseph Rusin finds a boyfriend pushing his girlfriend in fight over not using an outdoor payphone. Virginia Beach, VA Ofc Kevin Murphy separates a fighting husband, wife, and her boyfriend. Pierce County, WA Dep John Delgado resolves a dispute between a fighting couple that refuses to come outside to speak to officers. Pierce County, WA Sgt John Solheim finds a woman who claims she only accidentally stabbed her boyfriend.

videos.title: Love Hurts Part 2
videos.overview: Miami, FL Ofc Freddie Cruz won't say how her false teeth got out the window to the building awning below her window. Virginia Beach, VA Ofc Chet Hamilton talks to a man who kicked in his locked door when his girlfriend locked his apartment doors. Sarasota, FL Sgt Steve Burns on a domestic call where a jealous girlfriend hits boyfriend on side of his head. Police get her glasses back from the man. Lee County, FL on a domestic battery call finds a woman with major bruises and a new 'shiner' and teeth knocked out of her mouth. Kansas City, KA Ofc Mike Bowman stops a husband-and-wife fist-fight that started when he wanted to take one baby picture. Mesa, AZ Ofc Tom Intrieri finds a woman bleeding from her head after a beating from her boyfriend. L.A. CA Dep Scott Anger finds aftermath of fight between boyfriend and girlfriend. Bystanders saved her by restraining him until he turned blue. Providence, RI Ofc Fabio Zuena finds a man with knife wounds and a woman holding a bloody carving knife.

videos.title: Foolish Criminals 3
videos.overview: An arrest is made in a notorious New Jersey drug hotbed. Officers find a suspect hidden under a mattress. A bicycle thief is caught red handed.

videos.title: Armed & Dangerous Special Edition
videos.overview: Police investigate an attempted residential robbery that turned deadly. Officers visit a residence to find a suspect facing warrant charges. A high-speed chase comes to an end when the suspect crashes into a fence.

videos.title: Guns & Drugs Special Edition
videos.overview: Even though a high speed pursuit gets called off, officers are still able to use stop-sticks to stop the car of a 16 yo girl, who then fights with the police after they find drugs in her vehicle; a drug bust turns into a foot pursuit through backyards; and an officer pulls over a van for a minor traffic violation but while dealing with that he must run to the house next door to prevent one guy from splitting another guy's head open with a shovel.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 55
videos.overview: An officer spots a suspect returning to an area to pick up a hidden stash of narcotics- An officer learns that occupants of a suspicious vehicle has outstanding warrants. A domestic battery is investigated and justice is served.

videos.title: Resisting Arrest 2
videos.overview: An inebriated man is arrested after getting caught peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase officers bring down a well-known local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a local mobile home park.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 56
videos.overview: Three police arrest a bicycling drug dealer and his female client. Police respond to a call of an unhinged Rottweiler. Officers arrest an inebriated man after they spot him grabbing a female bystander.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 57
videos.overview: Officers are forced to use a taser to subdue a speeding driver. A man who claims he's merely returning a bicycle to its owner is arrested for soliciting prostitution. Officers respond to a complex domestic disturbance call.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 58
videos.overview: While attempting to break up a fight between two women an officer is attacked by one of the brawler's boyfriends. Officers confiscate a negligible amount of marijuana from a man during a routine traffic stop. A man is arrested for domestic abuse.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 59
videos.overview: A sizable amount of cocaine is seized during a routine search. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call, in which there are conflicting stories at the scene. An officer's patrol car is nearly struck by a train, twice.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 60
videos.overview: A man is questioned for assaulting a woman on a train. A man is arrested for burglarizing a casino, he initially denies the charges but surveillance footage corroborates. A father kicks his son out of the house after his drinking becomes problematic.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 61
videos.overview: Several units are in pursuit of a stolen vehicle. A man is found unconscious behind the wheel of a car after he crashed into a tree. Officers intervene in domestic dispute between a stripper and her boyfriend.

videos.title: Best Drug Busts 2 Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers arrest a couple during an argument over who owns the narcotics. Police seize a large bag of marijuana after a routine stop. A man is caught harboring drugs under his tongue during questioning.

videos.title: Caught Red Handed: 15 Greatest Takedowns Part 1
Caught Red Handed: 15 Greatest Takedowns Part 2
Hide 'n' Seek Special Edition
videos.overview: Officers utilize the help of the K-9 unit to find a suspect hiding in a shed. A cooperative suspect is faced with a list of charges. A motorcycle chase comes to an end after the suspect ditches the stolen bike and attempts to flee on foot.

videos.title: Bad Girls! 5 Special Edition
videos.overview: A woman bites both the arresting officer and a store manager after getting caught stealing beer. The passenger of a suspicious vehicle is caught attempting to hide drugs in the seat. Police respond to a domestic abuse call involving a knife and two women.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 62
videos.overview: Narcotics officers end up in a foot chase during a buy-bust operation. Officers respond to a dispute with a tow truck driver at a strip club. The odor of marijuana on a traffic stop leads to a citation for the cooperative driver.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 64
videos.overview: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. A vehicle is pulled over and a passenger is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 65
videos.overview: A white-knuckled police chase ends in a dramatic escape and an unsettling officer injury. An intoxicated prowler is reported after a woman spots him in a tree. Officers bring in the K-9 unit to sniff out a suspicious van.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 66
videos.overview: After a hobbled dealer attempts to flee on foot An elderly man is questioned after a report that he kicked a juvenile male in the face. A man is shot in the head by his female roommate.

videos.title: Mardi Gras 2004 #1
videos.overview: Incidents at Mardi Gras 2004 include a male flasher, lewd conduct by an intoxicated couple and a female transsexual exposing her breasts.

videos.title: Mardi Gras 2004 #2
videos.overview: A male mooner at Mardi Gras 2004 is arrested, along with a man seen spiking women's drinks. Also: a ceremonial parade of police down Bourbon Street to close the partying.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #67
videos.overview: In New Orleans, Officers Rose and White encounter an intoxicated bar patron who uses comical karate skills to hold police at bay. Meanwhile in Jacksonville, FL, Officer Eason comes to the aid of a woman who screamed for help after her mother allegedly came close to running her down as she walked along a dark road.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #68
videos.overview: In the second episode of the 17TH season premiere, cameras in Jacksonville, FL, follow Sergeant White as he conducts an undercover "buy-bust" sting operation designed to capture street-level drug dealers, including one who allegedly tries to swallow evidence. In Passaic County, NJ, Corporal Damiano encounters a suspect with a chronic drug habit who turns over some narcotics he recently purchased. Also in Jacksonville, Officer Futch's investigation of a domestic disturbance call leads to the arrest of a 15-year-old female who allegedly assaulted her mother during an argument.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #69
videos.overview: In New Orleans, Officers Lewis and Williams confront several suspects in an area known for drug activity, including one man who tries to discard a crack pipe, and a combative individual who allegedly attempts to swallow evidence. Meanwhile in Riverside County, CA, Deputy Barajas trails a suspicious vehicle traveling on a restricted off-road trail, and later makes an arrest after discovering methamphetamine and drug paraphernalia in the driver's possession.

videos.title: Resisting Arrest 3
videos.overview: Fort Worth Police Officer Sara Straton pulls over a suspected stolen vehicle and becomes alarmed when the driver unexpectedly jumps out of the vehicle and heads toward her. Distracted by the charging driver, the passenger runs from the scene and heads toward a home while the detained suspect claims that he's a schizophrenic. Also featured is Officer Ray Spencer of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department, responding to a report of a fight between feuding wedding chapel owners. At the scene, a female complainant, Cheryl, claims that one of her competitors threatened to harm her family and bomb her business.

videos.title: Tased and Confused Special Edition
videos.overview: When Officer Erik Nelson of the Norwood, OH, Police Division lends assistance on a routine traffic stop, the uncooperative driver becomes combative and Officer Nelson is forced to use his stun gun, triggering a dangerous high-speed car chase.

videos.title: Grand Theft Auto #2
videos.overview: After a high-speed chase, the suspect gives kudos to the police, especially the K-9 that tracks him down. Another segment features the lengths to which criminals will go when found with stolen vehicles clearly beyond their monetary means.

videos.title: Bad Girls! #6
videos.overview: When Officer Brett Mills of the Fort Worth Police Department assists another unit on a traffic stop of a stolen vehicle, the occupants are ordered out of the vehicle and taken into custody. During questioning and after informing the jittery suspect that her past has caught up with her, officers face a very belligerent and combative woman and must use force to restrain her. Another segment features Officer Terence Hightower of the Jacksonville Sheriff's Office, responding to a call where a male victim was stabbed in the arm by his date -- who apparently is a transgender. Each claims to have been attacked by the other and after a long explanation, one admits to the stabbing.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #70
videos.overview: Ft Worth officers chase a man that was shooting an AK-47 at a home and car. He is identified by a witness. WA a car is stopped for no headlights man arrested with suspended license. In PA undercover officers catch drug sellers.

videos.title: Las Vegas Heat 1 Part 1
videos.overview: Las Vegas detectives investigate the murder of the night bartender at the Odyssey Lounge. Pool cue sticks are missing and the wallet of the bartender.  Meanwhile, the driver of a stolen vehicle chased by police bails at the MGM parking garage and is caught after a chase. A car left running while owner went into a dry-cleaning business is stolen and quickly recovered by police. The driver is arrested in front of the just-arrived car's owner.

videos.title: Las Vegas Heat 1 Part 2
videos.overview: After an autopsy discussion at the morgue, detectives plan to investigate stolen credit card use, to acquire video of the suspect. An undercover officer in a painter disguise acts as bait for theft and quickly has a person steal money. The police catch the thief as he threw the money down before arrest. Suspect has long rap sheet. Credit card usage video giving a good face image of the suspect that is now clean-shaven. A uniformed officer surprises a woman urinating under a crane truck. The detectives receive a tipline call of an informant that had contact with suspect and was asked to buy brand new pool cue sticks in a case, and when asked how he got them the suspect said he killed a guy for them. A man jaywalks dropping women's clothes that were probably shoplifted and had beer cans in a pocket and one in his underwear. Detectives search hotel room of the suspect for evidence and find bloody red shirt and the bartender's wallet with ID. The suspect appears before judge and pleads not guilty. The prosecution is seeking the death penalty.

videos.title: Ho! Ho! Ho! 2
videos.overview: When Santa Ana County, CA, Police Officer Jose Gonzales questions a known prostitute, the woman insists that she is doing nothing wrong and claims that she was only escorting her disabled male acquaintance to a nearby fast food restaurant. Another segment features Deputy Steve Sabers and Corporal Brian Shepard of the Hamilton County, OH, Sheriff's Office, responding to a domestic disturbance. At the scene, a man explains that his ex-wife plans to marry a man she recently met on the Internet and move their children out of state.

videos.title: Got a Habit Special Edition
videos.overview: When Officer Jeff Kilby of the Norwood, OH, Police Division assists an undercover unit on a traffic stop of a suspicious vehicle that was allegedly involved in drug activity, suspects are taken into custody and questioned about their suspicious behavior. Officer Kilby was tipped off by the drug paraphernalia and oddly wrapped balls of tobacco found in the car during a search. When questioned about the tobacco, one of the suspects claims that he intended to smuggle it into jail. Later, Officer Kilby responds to a call from a local bank involving a man who was trying to pass a bad check. At the scene, the officer helps several officers take the combative suspect into custody.

videos.title: Busts Special Edition
videos.overview: When Fort Worth, TX, Police Department's Task Force serves a warrant at a residence known for drug dealing, suspects are immediately detained and the routine search surfaces a considerable amount of cocaine rocks stashed inside and outside a bedroom window. When the property owner returns from church, she sadly learns that her son and his friends have been selling drugs out of her home.

videos.title: Resisting Arrest #4
videos.overview: When Officer Gary Couso of the Santa Ana, CA, Police Department stops a suspicious vehicle coming out of an alley in an area of the city known for heavy drug activity, the officers question and conduct a routine search, and the passenger attempts to swallow a small amount of what is later determined to be crack cocaine. Another segment features Officer Gibson Smith of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department offering assistance on an investigation of a suspicious male who reportedly passed out in his vehicle at a local gas station for four hours. Although the suspect cannot account for a significant portion of his morning, he insists that he was searching for his keys the entire time.

videos.title: High Crimes 1 Special Edition
videos.overview: A drug suspect tries to swallow evidence after being stopped leaving an area known for drug activity; a man is questioned about passing out in his car.

videos.title: Bad Girls! 7 Special Edition
videos.overview: When Officer Joey Perez of the Fresno, CA, Police Department spots a suspicious female in an area of heavy drug activity, the officer questions the feisty female, finds drug paraphernalia, and the suspect attempts to flee. After the suspect is wrestled to the ground, she screams that she is 17 weeks pregnant and wants to speak with the sergeant. Meanwhile, Officer Joe Kolp of the Lakewood, WA, Police Department investigates an accident where a car went through the wall of a local bar. Several witnesses describe how the driver raced through the parking lot, hit an unidentified man, and then plowed into the bar. Officers hear conflicting reports from "witnesses" until one finally admits to that after an argument, she accidentally hit her boyfriend and then drove into the bar.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #71
videos.overview: Andrew Patzer and Jason Rose of the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department respond to a domestic disturbance call at a local apartment complex. At the scene, the officers interview a man who is clearly annoyed by their inquisition and tells the officers that he had an argument with his girlfriend and insists that everything's cool. However, after getting his girlfriend's version of the story and seeing his hostile outbursts, the police arrest him for disorderly conduct. Meanwhile, when Fort Worth, TX, Police Officer Brian Clark pursues a speeding vehicle that ran a red light, the desperate driver leads the officer to his home, where he bails out of the vehicle, runs into the residence and barricades himself inside the bathroom.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 72
videos.overview: When Little Rock, AR, Police Officers Jeff Holt and Matt Murski respond to a domestic disturbance in a neighborhood housing development, they discover a 90-year-old suspect who apparently stabbed the 50-year-old victim, leaving a bloody gash in her arm. The suspect insists that she was defending herself - but it quickly becomes clear she was intoxicated and lost control during a heated argument.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 73
videos.overview: In Covington, KY, Police Officer Derek Uhl responds to a neighborhood domestic dispute where a man claims that, after he told a woman that he and her husband had an affair, the husband directed a homosexual slur at him and then threatened him with violence. When interviewed by Officer Uhl, the husband denies both threatening and sleeping with the accuser. Meanwhile, the wife can only confirm the dispute between the two men.

videos.title: High Times Special Edition
videos.overview: The Norwood, OH, Police Department organizes a drug sting operation targeting a local drug dealer. When they close in on him, the dealer is suspected of eating the evidence - close to a quarter-ounce of crack cocaine. Other segments include a Pierce County, WA, deputy teaming with Lakewood, WA, police officers in a high-speed chase, and police officers in Fort Worth, TX, arriving on the scene where suspects are dismantling an "abandoned" truck.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #74
videos.overview: A white truck is disabled with stop sticks ending a pursuit in Pierce County, Washington but Deputies are forced to use tasers to gain compliance from the driver and passenger. A man admits he traded $50 worth of meth for a stolen Acura in Lakewood, Washington. The man's girlfriend admits she thought the car was stolen when her jobless boyfriend asked for a screwdriver to start it. A desperate man in Hamilton County, Ohio is caught with a baggie of a white powder that he admits is just sugar.

videos.title: 600th Milestone Episode
videos.overview: The 600th episode is the first of four all-new episodes scheduled to air in a celebratory COPS-a-thon. It's classic COPS in the milestone 600th episode when cameras capture a fleeing suspect, a domestic disturbance involving two "lovers" - not "fighters" - and a family disturbance that threatens to separate children from their father.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #75
videos.overview: A brawl is broken up; a suspect bails out of a moving car; a suspicious vehicle is stopped in a high drug-traffic area.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 76
videos.overview: A Hamilton County, Ohio Corporal goes to the home of a hit and run suspect and catches the man attempting to climb out of a back window when he spots Deputies surrounding his house. Fresno Police patrolling an area known for drugs and prostitution spot a suspect they've arrested previously named Delicious. Her ride claims he knew she was working and also thought she was a girl. Lakewood, Washington Officers attempt to stop a fleeing motorcycle before the reckless rider hits a truck and wrecks.

videos.title: Caught in the Act 2 Special Edition
videos.overview: This episode features a hit-and-run suspect in Hamilton County, OH; a "woman" hiding something that's uncovered when officers patrol a frequent prostitution area in Fresno, CA; and in Pierce County, WA, officers pursue a madman on a motorcycle at high speeds with a devastating conclusion.

videos.title: Grand Theft Auto 3 Special Edition
videos.overview: In the first of two Grand Theft Auto Special Editions, Deputy Kris Nordstrom of the Pierce County, WA, Police Department is in pursuit of a stolen vehicle with a desperate driver speeding through intersections and barreling down dark city streets. Also featured is Officer Ryan Hudson of the Little Rock, AR, Police Department, who pulls over a stolen vehicle and listens to the suspect claiming that a female crack addict let him borrow the car.

videos.title: Armed & Dangerous 2 Special Edition
videos.overview: Officer Chuck Elms of the Santa Ana, CA, Police Department responds to a robbery-in-progress call at a fast food restaurant, and at the scene, the officer questions a customer who witnessed the armed robbery. During the examination, Officer Elms learns that the brazen suspects robbed another establishment and were captured on surveillance, spurring an investigation. Also featured are Deputies of San Bernardino County, CA, Sheriff's Department responding to a shooting at a local residence where it's discovered that the panicked caller accidentally shot himself in the foot during an altercation to collect a debt .

videos.title: Bizarre Calls Special Edition
videos.overview: Officer Mike Souder of the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department responds to a vandalism call where a female resident frantically informs a dispatcher that several suspects vandalized her home with toilet paper. Also in Las Vegas, Officer Gibson Smith pulls over a vehicle that was reported stolen. When the owner of the vehicle arrives at the scene, she tells authorities that she met the driver at a casino, and after she agreed to take some erotic photos for him, he later stole her car.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 77
videos.overview: When Corporal Pete Enderle of the Hamilton County, OH, Sheriff's Office responds to an animal complaint, a lonely and frightened female resident reports a sneaky snake somewhere in her home. Also featured are Officers Chad Mills and Curtis Miller of the Fort Worth, TX, Police Department, responding to a burglary in progress. At the scene they immediately detain two suspects and one claims that he is a model citizen who regretfully agreed to steal the tires for $500 and a six-pack.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 78
videos.overview: When Officers James Rosetti and Bryan Craft of the Fresno, CA, Police Department respond to a call involving a man with a knife in a back alley, they encounter a woman with a large bloody knife in her back pocket. After officers locate the injured suspect and question several witnesses about the incident, it is discovered that when the suspect attempted to stab a male victim with the knife, the victim's son hit him with a shovel.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 79
videos.overview: When a concerned convenience store customer witnesses a suspect stealing beer, the older man chases the suspect. Fortunately, Officer Jeff Garwacki of the Fort Worth, TX, Police Department crosses their path and assists with apprehending the suspect, who, they later realize, broke free from handcuffs when he was detained earlier that day. While following Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Officer Gibron Smith, cameras capture a domestic disturbance involving a separated couple. The disturbance escalates when the woman is caught selling her husband's work tools for a pack of cigarettes.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 80
videos.overview: While Sgt. John Mon Pere of the Fresno, CA, Police Department responds to a report of two males fighting, he encounters an injured and intoxicated man sitting on a curb who claims he was involved in a fight with his father. When the investigation moves to the victim's home, the father explains that he and his son were out drinking at a strip club and on their way home they started fighting. Both men are too intoxicated to provide a coherent explanation for the fight and although charges were not pressed, one is sent to jail for public drunkenness. Another segment features Deputy Scott Gould of the San Bernardino County, CA, Sheriff's Department pulling over a vehicle for a traffic violation. After the female driver and her two male passengers are removed from the vehicle for questioning, the officer finds a couple of bags of marijuana. As the officer enforces the law, the driver lets the officer know that she believes the substance is harmless.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 81
videos.overview: Man reports to Pierce County, WA 9-1-1 that he sho and killed his friend. In Las Vegas a man is caught in the act of stealing parts from under the hood of a Cadilac Eldorado. In Fort Worth, TX a car with four males shot at another male is stopped and shooter identified.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 82
videos.overview: Pittsburgh Narcotics Detectives observe a hand-to-hand drug transaction in a parking lot. When they confront the female suspect, she attempts to swallow the crack cocaine. A very McConaughey-esque victim calls Travis County Sheriff's Deputies when he realizes his bachelor pad has been trashed. Gwinnett County, Georgia Police respond to a traffic collision and find a confused woman, a bloody teenager, a mangled bike, and one witness that says the kid flew more than ten feet into the air.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 83
videos.overview: When Detectives Rudy Reynoso and Juan Gonzalez of the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department respond to a call regarding the discovery of a human skull in a local park, they conduct an extensive and cautious search. With the assistance of a forensic anthropologist, they find additional human bones and discarded clothing in the immediate area. After an exhaustive day, the remains are identified when the serial number from a cell phone is traced to a man who has been reported missing. Another segment featuring the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department follows Officer Christopher Curtis responding to a domestic disturbance call. At the scene, the officer interviews a woman who claims that her unstable ex-boyfriend tried to break into her apartment. The ex-boyfriend confirms the woman's account and eventually comes to the emotional realization that he loves a woman who does not feel the same.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 84
videos.overview: Officers in Gwinnett County, Georgia, are called to a motel where a domestic disturbance involving three people is taking place.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 85
videos.overview: A disturbed man who threatened a restaurant customer; vehicle violations with bizarre circumstances.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #86
videos.overview: When Officer Ryan Cook of the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department responds to a home invasion robbery, he questions the victims, who describe how an unknown suspect kicked in their front door and then demanded to see his wife. Before backup arrives, the erratic man flees into the nearby parking lot and Officer Cook quickly pursues the suspect. Another segment features Officer Frank Brown and Deputy Mark Fry of the Pierce County, WA, Sheriff's Department investigating a suspicious fire and a shooting at a trailer park. At the scene, officers canvass the area and question the startled residents. As the officers search the surrounding dark wooded area, they unexpectedly encounter gunfire. When officers surround the gunman and attempt to negotiate his surrender, the suspect does not comply and the officers are forced to reassess the tense situation.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 87
videos.overview: A suspect with two felony warrants tries to run away while handcuffed; a portable fingerprint device confirms a fugitive's identity after he's located at a convenience store.

videos.title: Bad Girls! #8
videos.overview: When officers Aaron Williams and Pete Miller of the Chattanooga, TN, Police Department respond to a call where a woman is wielding an open switchblade knife, they discover a crack pipe. According to the male suspect at the scene, the woman was selling sex. Another segment features Anchorage, AK, Officers Robert Blanton, Arthur Anderson and Sgt. Lee Rohwer responding to a call regarding a hit-and-run accident. The male and female suspects have fled the scene, but once both are apprehended, we learn from eye witnesses that the couple was focused on each other and making out while driving. As a result, they steered into a parked vehicle.

videos.title: In Harm's Way Special Edition
videos.overview: When Officer Arthur Anderson of the Anchorage, AK, Police Department responds to a disturbance call, he has to deal with an intoxicated and suicidal male suspect who begs officers to shoot him. After apprehending the disturbed man, officers locate an unloaded gun inside the suspect<#s trailer home. Also featured is a drug deal bust when undercover Officer Will Jeffries and Sgt. Craig Campbell of the Pittsburgh, PA, Police Bureau pull over an vehicle with three suspects inside. The female driver is nabbed with heroin and admits that she needs help while the male passenger, although in cuffs, asks officers if he can roll one last cigarette before going to jail.

videos.title: Las Vegas Heat #2
videos.overview: When Officer Peter Connell of the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department spots two males plucking a pink flamingo from a hotel on the legendary Las Vegas strip, he detains the childish suspects, who claim they were executing a prank and got "cold feet." More lewd suspects are featured when Officers Mark Cirkosz and Peter Connell of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department arrive at a traffic stop where officers are already questioning the suspicious occupants. After a routine search of the vehicle uncovers 10 cell phones, several pairs of women's shoes, numerous credit cards and a little "black book," these suspects get more than they bargained for.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #88
videos.overview: An undercover drug sting; a domestic dispute.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 89
videos.overview: A broken taillight leads to a meth arrest; evidence of heroin is found in a truck with a child passenger.

videos.title: Ho! Ho! Ho! #3
videos.overview: When Detective Jason Lando of the Pittsburgh, PA, Bureau of Police investigates suspicious activity in a parking lot frequented by drug users and prostitutes, the parked driver claims to be waiting for her daughter. As the investigation continues, officers recognize the driver's daughter as someone they encounter frequently. The shaky young girl is found with drug paraphernalia and the situation becomes very emotional as she is detained in front of her mother. On the other side of the country, Sgt. Tom Jenkins of the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department stops a young female behaving suspiciously on the legendary Las Vegas strip. After the female suspect lies to Sgt. Jenkins, she eventually breaks down and admits to working the streets. Another segment features Officer Derek Bishop of the Spokane, WA, Police Department, responding to a call where a female suspect claims to be hitchhiking. Although she was ticketed several weeks before for prostitution, she maintains her innocence. When officers begin to question her credibility, some arresting surprises surface and the suspect attempts to bargain with officers.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 90
videos.overview: An uncooperative suspect starts a scuffle; juveniles disturb a woman.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 91
videos.overview: Citizens assist in the arrests of a drunk driver and a man claiming to have robbed a bank.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 92
videos.overview: Ft Myers, FL yellow taxi drug sting. Las Vegas, NV woman stabs man with scissors. Fresno, CA "man with a knife" call, man holds kitchen type knife to a woman's throat.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 93
videos.overview: In Las Vegas, the police pursue three SUV vandals with the aid of the vehicle's owner. Then, the driver of a stolen car tells Atlanta police that he borrowed it from a friend.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 94
videos.overview: Gwinnett County, Ga., police use a Taser to stabilize a crime scene; and Las Vegas cops respond to a father-son dispute in which each accuses the other of having started the commotion.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 95
videos.overview: Pittsburgh police nab suspects and find drugs in a convenience-store parking lot; a Travis County, Texas, officer stops a car and smells marijuana inside.

videos.title: Las Vegas Heat 3 Special Edition
videos.overview: While on routine patrol, Officer Peter Connell of the Las Vegas, NV, Metropolitan Police Department observes a female pedestrian allowing a male stranger to kiss and fondle her in public. When the officer questions the couple about their conduct, the inebriated woman becomes annoyed and alleges that the officer is harassing them. Another heated segment features Officer Ryan Cook of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department spotting a woman brushing a man off before he gets in his car. Concerned for the woman's safety, the officer stops the vehicle and questions the occupants. Upon questioning, the uneasy driver tells the officer that he got into a fight with his girlfriend because she believes that he's a "loser." Meanwhile, the woman confirms her boyfriend's account and allows the officer to search the vehicle, where he finds several open containers and roach clips.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 96
videos.overview: Gwinnett County, Ga., cops engage in a high-speed chase with a driver who failed to signal for a lane change; Travis County, Texas, officers respond to a call about a suspicious person in a park.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 97
videos.overview: A Santa Ana, Cal., officer fresh from firearms instruction encounters a young man with a cocked gun concealed in his pocket. Elsewhere, a Las Vegas cop intervenes in a lovers' quarrel.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #98
videos.overview: Pittsburgh Detectives attempt to stop a vehicle, but the driver speeds away, tossing a handgun out the window. Officers in Chattanooga stop a vehicle and find an open beer. The passenger begins to wail when he realizes he may have to go to jail for the still-cold adult beverage. A couple argues over a difference of opinion in Travis County, TX. The husband believes he can beat his child if he doesn't approve of his lifestyle, while the wife wants to support any offspring's decisions in love.

videos.title: Coast to Coast 99
videos.overview: A West Palm Beach, Fla., officer searches for a stolen vehicle; a Palm Springs, Cal., officer questions a motorist suspected of DUI.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #100
videos.overview: Pittsburgh Narcotics Detectives spot a possible drug transaction in progress and jump out on a man who quickly jams several crack pipes into his pocket. A wanted man in Spokane, Washington attempts to elude officers by hiding on a roof, but when they close the net, he ducks into a home to hide in a crawlspace from the K-9. Officers in Chattanooga respond to a concerned woman who reports that her husband has been downloading information on cooking meth and now her trailer smells like chemicals.

videos.title: Coast to Coast #101
videos.overview: Narcotics Detectives in Pittsburgh get out with a duo seen passing crack rocks. One man dumps a gun on a porch and proclaims his innocence despite having a mouth full of crack cocaine. Spokane Officers respond to a domestic call where a woman's ex is threatening to shoot her and spot the male suspect running from the scene.
